data.meta_description: Who is Eminem's wife in 2024? The answer may surprise you!  Eminem, whose real name is Marshall Mathers, has been married twice. His first marriage was to Kimberly Anne Scott in 1999. The couple divorced in 2001 but remarried in 2006. They divorced again in 2009.  In 2010, Eminem began dating Mariah Carey. The couple was engaged for a short time but never married. Eminem has not been publicly linked to anyone since his breakup with Carey.

In 2010, Eminem began dating Mariah Carey. The couple was engaged for a short time but never married. Eminem has not been publicly linked to anyone since his breakup with Carey.

So, who will Eminem's wife be in 2024? Only time will tell!
